wikitext.*:
'''''hîth''''' is a noun meaning "mist" or "fog" in [[Sindarin]].<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, ''hîth''</ref> Compare with ''[[hísië]]'' in [[Quenya]].

==Examples==
* ''[[Misty Mountains|Hithaeglir]]'' = "Misty Mountains"
* ''[[Nen Hithoel]]'' = "Lake of Mist"
* ''[[Hithlum]]'' = "Land of Mist"

{{references}}
* ''[[The Languages of Tolkien's Middle-earth]]'' by [[Ruth S. Noel]]
* [http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/sindar/dict-sd-en.html Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] compiled by [[Didier Willis]]
